title: Number of Ways to Paint N × 3 Grid
content: You have a of size and you want to paint each cell of the grid with exactly one of the three colours: Red, Yellow or Green while making sure that no two adjacent cells have the same colour (i.e no two cells that share vertical or horizontal sides have the same colour). You are given the number of rows of the grid. Return the number of ways you can paint this . As the answer may grow large, the answer must be computed modulo .
